channel.description: Recent content in Civil Service People Survey 2020 on Civil Service People Survey data explorer

item.title: Organisation scores
item.description: People Survey 2020 results for all participating organisations

item.title: Benchmark time-series
item.description: The Civil Service People Survey benchmark (median) scores over time

item.title: Mean scores
item.description: The Civil Service People Survey mean (all respondents) scores over time

item.title: Organisation dashboard
item.description: A dashboard allowing you to review the results for individual organisations

item.title: About
item.description: This site is a work in progress prototype, to demonstrate and test a new approach to publishing information from the Civil Service People Survey. It is being developed in the open to enable end-user consultation and feedback. More complete information about the survey, including historical datasets, is available from Civil Service People Survey hub on GOV.UK.
